settings.editor: I'm Paulo Parker, a professional writer, and editor. I'm looking for new opportunities in my career and ready to challenge myself. I have a great passion for my job and what I love about it most is that it helps me get to know myself better. Moreover, it helps me discover new horizons nd learn more and more about life and its surroundings. I'm keen on thinking and acting outside of the box, and I tend to bring together creativity and literacy in any text I write. The ability to express the most complicated phenomenon in simple words is what defines me.

settings.title: I speak three languages: English, Germany, and Spanish.
